scripts.start: npm run build-client && npm run server
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.server: cd server && npm i && node index.js
scripts.serve: cd server && npm i && nodemon index.js
scripts.tunnel: npm run tunnel1 & npm run tunnel2
scripts.disco: disco projects:remove jungle; disco projects:add --github elijer/jungle --name jungle --domain jungle.rcdis.co
